description: Type of the entity containing definingSql

enum.name: materializedview
enum.description: A materialized view is a view whose content is defined by a Synapse SQL query and it is persisted as a synapse table.

enum.name: virtualtable
enum.description: A virtual table is represents the results of Synapse SQL query. The results are not persisted and the query is run each time the virtual table is queried.
